text: 13:7 Rom 15:1; 1 Korin 9:12; Galesia 6:2; 2 Timoti 2:24; 1 Pita 4:8Gumazamizir igharaz darazigh ifongeziba, bizir kaba men otivam. Me biziba bar da atertɨ, bizitam me abɨnan kogham. Egh me nɨghnɨzir gavgavir Godɨn itim ateghan kogham. Egh bizir aghuir me fogha iniamiba bagh mɨzuam ikɨva, osɨmtɨzibar dughiamɨn, me tugh gavgavigh irɨghan kogham.
